item.description:
Are you new to running or looking to get back into it? Are you looking for a relaxed 1-3 mile run with walking breaks as needed? Are you looking to build up to a 5k or the Saturday Fun Run's 3 mile loop? Or just want to meet some great new people?
Then this is the run for you!

We will meet at the corner of Mass Ave and Beacon Street. We will stretch and chat with some running in the middle.

Hope to see you there!
Tree
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the 5' tall gal in running clothes standing on the corner

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Short Sunday Run
